columns.name: session_id
columns.desc: Unique identifier for the gameplay session

columns.name: app_id
columns.desc: A string identifying which game from which the event came

columns.name: timestamp
columns.desc: The time when the event was logged

columns.name: event_data
columns.desc: Data specific to an event type, encoded as a JSON string

columns.name: event_source
columns.desc: An enum member indicating whether the event was generated by the Game, or by a Detector

columns.name: app_version
columns.desc: The version of the game from which the event came

columns.name: log_version
columns.desc: The version of the logging code for the game from which the event came

columns.name: offset
columns.desc: The local offset of the event time from GMT

columns.name: user_id
columns.desc: A custom, per-player ID, only exists if player entered an ID on one of our custom portal pages, else null

columns.name: user_data
columns.desc: Metadata specific to a user, encoded as a JSON string

columns.name: game_state
columns.desc: Metadata about the state of the game when the event occurred, encoded as a JSON string

columns.name: index
columns.desc: Counter of events in the session, from 0. A row with session_n = i is the (i+1)-th event of the session
